text: Place de Dublin is a street in the 8th arrondissement of Paris. According to the book Dictionnaire historique des rues de Paris by French Historian Jacques Hillairet the street was named after Dublin, the capital city of the Republic of Ireland. It was notably depicted in French artist Gustave Caillebotte's painting Paris Street; Rainy Day. ==References== Category:Streets in the 8th arrondissement of Paris
title: Place de Dublin
